attributes.action: Help fund NHS operation for british children
attributes.additional_details: To get out of his wheelchair tommie needs to raise 25000 pounds shockingly other families have had to raise much more to see there children walk independly
attributes.background: Tommie was born at 30 weeks and has cerebral palsy recently he has been assessed by a team at great ormond street hospital and has been told that a sdr operation will help him walk independently however the nhs wont fund it meaning £25 000 has to be paid by family/friends

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling for the SDR operation to be made available on the NHS for all children who need it.
